body_html:
Hi @pjh5 and @briandw
I have the same/similar error when I try to build caffe2 in a different environment all from scratch. I am following these instructions: https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile#install-with-gpu-support
and getting the same error.
Any resolutions yet?

Thank you,
Selin
